name: UpdateBusinessService
description:
Update the details of a business service in PagerDuty.

Use this tool to update an existing business service, which models capabilities across multiple technical services. This tool is useful when business services require modifications, such as changes in ownership or scope. It requires the `services.write` OAuth scope.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the business service that needs updating.
